definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: It is of great significance to strengthen humanist education in order to change the bad social mood.
sentences.chinese: 加强人文主义教育对改变社会不良风气具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Their refusal to remove the public-house will put a premium on drinking in the district.
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝迁走那家酒店，这将助长该地区的酗酒风气。

sentences.english: Biomass of tropical montane rain forest in Xishuangbanna of Southwest China;
sentences.chinese: 山地雨林是热带北缘季风气候的地带性森林类型。

sentences.english: She blames a culture that shuns criticism for the drop in standards. "It's the media, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 她指责现在不予批评的风气，降低了标准。

sentences.english: We have to admit its existence and thus take effective measures to correct it.
sentences.chinese: 承认不良风气的存在，就要采取正确的措施加以纠正。

sentences.english: When private British and American companies were established and prospered they followed the same custom.
sentences.chinese: 私人的英美公司设立而发达时，他们也有同样的风气。
它是亚热带温润季风气候。

sentences.english: Song's emperors prefer to lead the handwriting fashion according to their own favor.
sentences.chinese: 宋代帝王更多以自己的喜好来引领社会书学风气。
种族间的嫉恨是一种不良的风气。

sentences.english: Now the social atmosphere of really too bad.
sentences.chinese: 现在的社会风气实在太坏了。

sentences.english: The Hunshandake sand land located in the warm temperate zone which is continental monsoon climate area.
sentences.chinese: 浑善达克沙地属中温带半干旱大陆性季风气候区。

sentences.english: The committee should encourage criticism and self-criticism among its members, and this should be made habitual.
sentences.chinese: 党委内部要开展批评和自我批评，要有这种风气。

sentences.english: Korea enjoys a moderate monsoonal climate in East Asia.
sentences.chinese: 韩国属温带的东亚季风气候。

sentences.english: Belong to the coastal sub-humid warm temperate continental monsoon climate, four distinct seasons.
sentences.chinese: 属于暖温带滨海半湿润大陆性季风气候，四季分明。

sentences.english: Obviously , they are the symbol that competing comes after friendship .
sentences.chinese: 很明显的是他们象征着友谊第一比赛第二的和谐风气。

sentences.english: With a typical continental warm temperate zone monsoon climate, Beijing has four distinct seasons.
sentences.chinese: 与一典型大陆暖温带季风气候，北京拥有四季分明。

definition: noxious winds, evil influences (idiom); malignant social trends
to have become common practice (idiom)/to become a general trend
style of study/academic atmosphere/school discipline/school traditions
subordinates follow the example of their superiors (idiom)
to be in vogue/to be prevalent
to put money above everything else
current custom/current way of doing things
